Related repos

  • browser extension for translating pages, subtitles, messages, with offline mode, custom translators, personal dictionary, open-source and privacy-focused
  • bilingual web translator extension and userscript
  • Language learning platform with community ownership
  • macOS app for quick word lookup, translation, and OCR with support for multiple translation services
  • Framework for language agents with cognitive architectures
  • Programming system for writing in English
  • Run large language models in a browser
  • curated list of machine learning libraries and frameworks by language
  • Browser extension swaps words on webpages with your target language to help you learn as you read
